name: chrome-issue-reporter
description: Chrome extension that captures page context and helps file GitHub issues directly from your browser

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp -r extension/* dist/ && node scripts/apply-update-url.js
scripts.package: npm run build && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./extension/manifest.json').version") && cd dist && zip -r ../chrome-issue-reporter-v${VERSION}.zip * && cd .. && echo "\nâœ… Extension packaged successfully: chrome-issue-reporter-v${VERSION}.zip"

author: Chrome Issue Reporter Contributors
